01.name: Hay Bales
01.caption: I love hay bales. Took this snap on a drive through the countryside past some straw fields.

02.name: Lake
02.caption: The lake was so calm today. We had a great view of the snow on the mountains from here.

03.name: Canyon
03.caption: I hiked to the top of the mountain and got this picture of the canyon and trees below.

04.name: Iceberg
04.caption: It was amazing to see an iceberg up close, it was so cold but didnâ€™t snow today.

05.name: Desert
05.caption: The red cliffs were beautiful. It was really hot in the desert but we did a lot of walking through the canyons.

06.name: Fall
06.caption: Fall is coming, I love when the leaves on the trees start to change color.

07.name: Plantation
07.caption: I drove past this plantation yesterday, everything is so green!

08.name: Dunes
08.caption: My summer vacation to the Oregon Coast. I love the sandy dunes!

09.name: Countryside Lane
09.caption: We enjoyed a quiet stroll down this countryside lane.

10.name: Sunset
10.caption: Sunset at the coast! The sky turned a lovely shade of orange.

11.name: Cave
11.caption: I did a tour of a cave today and the view of the landscape below was breathtaking.

12.name: Bluebells
12.caption: I walked through this meadow of bluebells and got a good view of the snow on the mountain before the fog came in.
